text: Tebaayawukana okugyako luvannyuma lwa kumanya okubajjira (nga ekyabatuusa kwekyo) bwe bukyayi obwali wakati waabwe, era singa si kigambo ekyakulembera nga kiva ewa Mukama omulabirizi wo (ekyo butazikirizaawo bonoonyi) okutuusa ebbanga eggere (erya baweebwa) waalisaliddwawo wakati waabwe (mu kiseera ekyo kye nnyini) era mazima abo abasikizibwa ekitabo oluvanyuma lwabwe, mu kyo bali mu kubuusabuusa okujjudde okutankana
